room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Revenge" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
room_description:
Experience the newest escape room in the Sacramento area! Just 30 min away, in Folsom, this escape room provides an immersive, live adventure based on actual Historical Heroes/Heroines.
Expect complete immersion whether it is in 1806 London at night or midday Haarlem, Holland in 1944. You will be the "Indian Jones"/ "Sherlock Holmes" in the middle of the adventure! Solve puzzles, riddles, clues, etc to accomplish your objective and to escape before the "bad guys" come back. Book your friends, family, or co-workers to develop teamwork and to build great memories.
